com.zberman2.DataManager

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zberman2.DataManager.GUI

  • public class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which describes the functionality of the Graphical User Interface (for now, the GUI is static) Creates an 8x8 chessboard, outlined with rank and file labels Referenced http://stackoverflow.com/questions/21077322/create-a-chess-board-with-jpanel to get started on this GUI design. The only function below actually taken from stackoverflow.com is createImages(), everything else is my code, and my refactoring done to make everything easy to read

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GUI(Board board)
      Constructs the gui by setting the board object, and calling the drawBoard entry method

      Getter for the gui JPanel
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Tester for the GUI class Simply displays the gui and leaves it there until it is closed
